name: Cake Quest (Crusty Fish Studios)
description:
This is a short game about a dwarf named Glorgan Copperbeard who is obsessed with cake. one day you eat Greenville's prized cake and are banished from the town. Your goal is to remake the cake by finding all the cake ingredients!

This game was made for the Australian Stem Video Game Challenge.

MovingD-pad (Game-Boy)
WASD/Arrow Keys
D-pad(Mobile)Interact
A button
ZA button
StartStart button
EnterStart button

This was the first game I have ever created but it won't be my last!                                           

Created by Crusty Fish Studios.
